name: Another World (itch) (D-Studios)
description:
This is my entry for the Global Game Jam 2022. The theme was Duality. This game fits the theme as the player has to alternate between the white and black worlds in order to complete each level.

This game is a puzzle platformer. In order to complete the game, the player must keep track of what objects are remaining in both the white and black worlds. Furthermore, the player has to strategically use objects in order to avoid obstacles. The player can move, jump, push boxes, and climb.

This game was made in the California Polytechnic San Luis Obispo Game Development Club.
